::Diamond::

She looked at the chip. "I don't know. But I wonder if it has 
anything to do with her ghost fighting?" She looked down at 
Vamprah."I think we should get her to a CR.  She might recover better 
in one."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Reptilica/DevilDuer::
> 
> Reptilica yelps as gunfire hits him, looking up at the bat probes. 
He 
> frowns. He's had enough wounds on duty lately, he didn't feel like 
> getting any more.
> 
> Another shot hitting him in the shoulder, Reptilica turns around, 
> flying off at full speed back toward the Alliance base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer frowns, looking at the chip as it falls out of the 
> necklace. He snatches it up, cutting the rest of Vamprah's necklace 
> off while he looks at it.
> 
> "Strange..." he says, raising his dagger after cutting Vamprah's 
> necklace. He looks at Diamond, "What do ya think this chip does?"
